constituent: boar, pack of wild dogs, someone, puppet, sooty, old man, sun, day
koohiiStory1: My love doll is made of special pheremone impregnated vinyl. Unfortunately, a pack of wild dogs mistook her for a wild boar and tore her to pieces. Oh dear!
koohiiStory2: (Image: a pack of wild dogs chasing Pinocchio who´s trying to escape by riding on the back of a boar. See him bouncing around as they race along?).
